name: Blob.ex (Blinkiscoding)
description: The controls for this game are A and D to move left and right, and W to jump. To spawn a clone, you have to press C. You have to wait 5 seconds before spawning a clone in again. every time you push a clone into the hole, you will gain a point. There will also be gems that will fall from the sky. If you collect a certain amount of gems, the amount of time for you to spawn a clone will decrease. Have Fun!
